game.blurb: You are a kitten in a catnip forest.

woodcutter.label: Woodcutter
woodcutter.description: Use your mystical kitten powers and get back to chopping!

scholar.label: Scholar
scholar.description: Ponder the myriad wonders of the world around you.

farmer.label: Farmer
farmer.description: Cultivate catnip in the surrounding lands.

gather-catnip.label: Gather catnip
gather-catnip.description: Gather some catnip in the forest.

refine-catnip.label: Refine catnip
refine-catnip.description: Use your mystical kitten powers to convert catnip into wood.

catnip-field.label: Catnip field
catnip-field.description: Plant some catnip to grow in the village. Fields have increased production during Spring and decreased production during Winter.
catnip-field.flavor: ‘Nip as far as the eye can see.

hut.label: Hut
hut.description: A simple home with space for 2 kittens. Kittens consume catnip to stay alive.

library.label: Library
library.description: A library to store sacred catkind knowledge. Increases science output.

kitten.arrived: A kitten has joined your village! | {count} kittens have joined your village!
kitten.starved: A kitten starved to death. | {count} kittens starved to death.

calendar.label: Calendar
calendar.description: Develops the ability to predict when the seasons will change. Essential for advanced agriculture.
calendar.effect: Provides a way of more precise time tracking.

agriculture.label: Agriculture
agriculture.description: The basis of all civilised life. Allows the working of land for food.

astronomy.rare-event: A rare astronomical event occurred in the sky
